title: hub.sync Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Manually initiates a sync with Notehub.

allow.description: Set to `true` to remove the Notecard from certain types of [penalty boxes](/guides-and-tutorials/notecard-guides/understanding-notecard-penalty-boxes/) (the default is `false`).

in.description: Set to `true` to only sync pending inbound Notefiles. **Required** when using NTN mode with Starnote to check for inbound Notefiles.

out.description: Set to `true` to only sync pending outbound Notefiles.

samples.title: Manual Sync
samples.description: Initiate a manual sync with Notehub.

samples.title: Sync with Penalty Box Removal
samples.description: Sync and remove Notecard from penalty boxes.

samples.title: Inbound Only Sync
samples.description: Sync only pending inbound Notefiles (required for NTN mode).
